statements: SELECT * FROM waste_generation_reports;
SELECT report_id, quantity, collection_date FROM waste_generation_reports;
SELECT location_id, waste_type FROM waste_generation_reports WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM waste_generation_reports WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT report_id, collection_date FROM waste_generation_reports ORDER BY collection_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM waste_generation_reports WHERE location_id = 'abc123' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, waste_type, quantity FROM waste_generation_reports WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT location_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM waste_generation_reports GROUP BY location_id HAVING total_reports > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT location_id FROM waste_generation_reports WHERE waste_type IN ('Plastic', 'Paper', 'Glass') ORDER BY location_id;
SELECT report_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM waste_generation_reports GROUP BY report_id HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_reports WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, waste_amount FROM waste_reports WHERE waste_amount > 100;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM waste_reports;
SELECT location_name, waste_type, waste_amount FROM waste_reports WHERE location_id = 2 ORDER BY waste_amount DESC;
SELECT location_name, waste_type FROM waste_reports WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND waste_amount < 50;
SELECT * FROM waste_reports WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT location_name, waste_amount FROM waste_reports WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY waste_amount DESC
SELECT location_name, waste_type, waste_amount FROM waste_reports WHERE waste_amount > 1000 AND waste_type LIKE '%Recyclable%'
SELECT location_name, waste_amount FROM waste_reports WHERE waste_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY location_name
SELECT location_name, SUM(waste_amount) AS total_waste FROM waste_reports GROUP BY location_name HAVING total_waste > 5000
SELECT * FROM WasteGenerationReports;
SELECT location_id, waste_type FROM WasteGenerationReports WHERE generation_rate > 10;
SELECT location_id, city, country FROM Locations WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT trend_id, waste_type, trend_value, trend_date FROM WasteTrends ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT trend_id, waste_type, AVG(trend_value) AS average_value FROM WasteTrends GROUP BY waste_type;
SELECT * FROM WasteGenerationReports WHERE generation_rate > 10 ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM Locations WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT SUM(trend_value) AS total_trend_value, waste_type FROM WasteTrends GROUP BY waste_type ORDER BY total_trend_value DESC;
SELECT report_id, waste_type, generation_rate FROM WasteGenerationReports JOIN WasteTrends ON WasteGenerationReports.waste_type = WasteTrends.waste_type WHERE trend_value > 50;
SELECT location_id, location_name, city, country, region FROM Locations ORDER BY location_id;
SELECT * FROM waste_locations;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM waste_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT category_name, description FROM waste_categories WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT location_name, generation_date, generation_amount FROM waste_locations INNER JOIN waste_generation ON waste_locations.location_id = waste_generation.location_id;
SELECT DISTINCT state FROM waste_locations ORDER BY state DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT location_name, state FROM waste_locations WHERE location_id > 5 ORDER BY state DESC;

SELECT wl.location_name, wc.category_name, wr.report_date FROM waste_locations wl JOIN waste_generation wg ON wl.location_id = wg.location_id JOIN waste_reports wr ON wg.generation_id = wr.generation_id WHERE wg.generation_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT MAX(generation_amount), MIN(generation_amount), AVG(generation_amount) FROM waste_generation;
SELECT wc.category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM waste_generation wg JOIN waste_categories wc ON wg.category_id = wc.category_id GROUP BY wc.category_name HAVING total_reports > 3;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM waste_generation ORDER BY generation_date DESC;
SELECT location_id, SUM(generation_rate) AS total_generation FROM waste_generation GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT location_id, AVG(trend_rate) AS average_trend_rate FROM waste_trend WHERE trend_year = 2021 GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name FROM locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT waste_type_name, generation_rate FROM waste_generation WHERE generation_rate > 100;
SELECT trend_year, SUM(trend_rate) AS total_rate FROM waste_trend GROUP BY trend_year;
